title: Golden Hour Memory

song_root.core_event: Remembering a perfect summer evening with someone who's no longer in my life
song_root.core_resistance: Wanting to stay in the memory instead of moving forward
song_root.core_longing: To hold onto the warmth without the pain of loss
song_root.core_transformation: From clinging to the past to cherishing it as it was

song_intent.imagery_texture: Soft focus, warm light through leaves, faded photographs

technical_constraints.rule_breaking_justification: Keeping the ambient room sound and natural noise creates authenticity - like you're actually in that summer evening moment. The imperfection makes it feel real, not polished away.

notes: Mixolydian mode gives bittersweet quality (major with flat 7). Laid-back groove, behind the beat for relaxed feel. Keep room noise and natural ambience. Fingerpicking guitar with open tunings. Minimal production for intimacy.
